PKGDIFF(1) General Commands Manual PKGDIFF(1)

NAME

pkgdiff — compare software packages' footprints

SYNOPSIS

pkgdiff [-chv] file1 file2

DESCRIPTION

pkgdiff searches which files are new and which are removed between two software packages. pkgdiff operates on binary packages and requires pkginfo(1) and diff(1).

The options are as follows:

-c, --color
Colorize diff(1) output.
-v, --version
Print version and exit.
-h, --help
Print help and exit.

EXIT STATUS

0 if success, >0 otherwise.

SEE ALSO

pkginfo(1)

September 3, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
